newFeatures.title: Added Support for the OPTIONS Verb on Endpoints' Routes
description: You can now add a new route using the OPTIONS verb directly from your Endpoint's detail page.

improvements.title: More insights on production environments from the Projects table
description: We've enriched the Projects list to provide quick access to key production metrics. Now, by simply hovering over a tooltip near the production environment's name, you can instantly see its last deploy time, along with its current CPU and memory usage. This enhancement gives you a faster and easier way to monitor the health and status of your production environments directly from the Projects table.

bugFixes.title: Important Bug Fix
description: We resolved an issue that occurred in a specific scenario: when a ConfigMap was deleted and immediately recreated with the same name, the Console could fail to save the change correctly, causing configuration corruption. This configuration can then only be restored using a previous snapshot, which is possible within the [dedicated Revision History modal](/docs/products/console/set-up-infrastructure/revisions-and-versions#revision-history). This fix has been implemented also on _Console Helm Chart_ `v15.0.3-beta.2`.
